title: Riot support help? Any players input is still helpful please
body: Hi, i recently got hacked and they changed the email and pw of the acc. I submitted a recovery request almost 3 days ago and still not reply. They did say they are experiencing high volumes of requests but its still taking a bit. BUT NOW ONTO THE REAL ISSUE, the confirmation email they sent me to my ticket opens and says "oops looks like you mistyped the link" This happened twice on both of my recovery submissions. Is this something to do with me or what? because im confused on how im going to be able to recover my acc >.< please help clarify

replies.body: You may be unable to login to the ticketing site if you're unable to login to the account.  No sweat, though, because any response you receive will be sent to your email.  You'll be able to use your email to reply back as well!  Looking into this for you, it looks like you've got a few tickets open on this.  Response time will be a bit depending on the size of the queue, so hang tight as more tickets can cause delays in responding.  The account team will reach out to you as soon as possible!
thank you so much, i was worried i wouldnt be getting riots reply, now im at ease about atleast having a chance to get my account back, now its just a waiting game lol. ^.^
